MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW12 postcode area of Congleton, affecting properties in Astbury, Newbold Astbury, Moreton and the surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 5:32 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:00 am on 28th December, 2020.
